name: Bachelor`s Night
description:
You are celebrating the last night of your best friend as bachelor. Go around the town and find ways to have tons of fun. Your friend will follow you but will go for fun activities around or if you make them happen ;). Make sure he gets most fun by the end of the night. Be careful, the city is expensive and people can be aggressive. 

How to Play-  Use standard WASD/Shift/Space and mouse for moving around in the game. Use G for interaction  with environment. Your goal is to increase the happiness meter of your friend, who will do various activities based on situations. 

DEVLOG : The game applies GOAP system to design the behavior of all the NPCs in the city and the companion. The basic idea is to create a system with goals and action which is easy to implement and expand. The system is still in development however once completed, this universe can be expanded beyond the town.
